legal_basis: section 96 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
risk_of_persecution: fear of persecution in Sri Lanka
decision_reasoning: lack of evidence linking to LTTE
ignored evidence showing risks faced by MV Sun Sea passengers
underestimated likelihood of detention and torture upon return
reconsideration_order: case was remanded for reconsideration by a different panel
application_details: Judicial review of the RPD's decision at the Federal Court
claim_nature: refugee protection based on fear of persecution
humanitarian_considerations: association with the MV Sun Sea
